summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2396, for the improvement of 11th Avenue West from West Blaine Street to West Galer Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by the construction of sewers therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with appurtenances; under Ordinance No. 25046 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
